Template.HtmlPart:
Hi {{name}},

Welcome to the {{company}} Credit Program!

We've received your application, and are currently processing the documents you provided to us as part of our KYC process.

Once we've done our checks, we'll send you another email confirming that your registration is complete. If we need any additional documents, we'll let you know.

We look forward to helping you!

Best wishes,

Arboreum, on behalf of {{company}}

Hi {{name}},

Welcome to the {{company}} Credit Program!

We've received your application, and are currently processing the documents you provided to us as part of our KYC process.
